general questions

Safari Browser

For MacOS: Go to System Settings > Privacy & Security > Location Services and click the toggle for Safari.

For iPhone: Go to Settings > Privacy & Security > Location Services > Safari and then switch on your desired location detection option.

about spotWeath

SpotWeath is an app that fetches your coordinates and displays your location on the map, along with the weather in your city. To use this app, simply allow the browser to access your coordinates.

what are some of the technical details behind spotWeath

SpotWeath is built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript without any frameworks. It utilizes the Geolocation Web API, LocationIQ API, and WeatherAPI, as well as the JavaScript library Leaflet to render the map.
